1.- Economic Complexity Index from the Observatory of Economic Complexity

```{r}
# Option 1: Download country-product trade data (HS 2-digit level)
# This includes the raw data to calculate ECI or download pre-calculated values
temp_dir <- tempdir()

# Download country-product trade data (HS 2-digit level)
trade_zip <- file.path(temp_dir, "country_hsproduct2digit_year.csv.zip")
download.file(
  url = "https://intl-atlas-downloads.s3.amazonaws.com/country_hsproduct2digit_year.csv.zip",
  destfile = trade_zip,
  mode = "wb"
)

# Unzip and read the data
unzip(trade_zip, exdir = temp_dir)
trade_data <- read_csv(file.path(temp_dir, "country_hsproduct2digit_year.csv"))

# View structure
glimpse(trade_data)
```
